title: Calculate Refund on return items of an order
description: The endpoint response is returned directly to the action creator (the component). No changes to the state are made.

error.description: The error object. It contains the details related to the error.

errorCode.description: The error code. The error code corresponding to the error.

errorMessage.description: The error message. The error message describing the error.

status.description: The error status. The HTTP status code.
